name: Noël 3: Mission on the Line
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

Save the students snatched away by terrorists in adventure game "Noel3 MISSION ON THE LINE". In addition to mystery-solving elements, a thrilling storyline and wealth of animation deliver an enhanced gameplay.

This content is compatible with PlayStation®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).
